--- title: | | [R Lecture 10]{style="color:coral;font-size:0.6em"} | [지리공간적 시각화]{style="font-size:1em"} author:
이상일(서울대학교 지리교육과 교수) date: 2025-9-2 format: revealjs: logo: snu_edu_1.png footer: https://sangillee.snu.ac.kr/ transition: fade transition-speed: fast margin: 0.05 center: false # smaller: false # scrollable: false code-link: true code-copy: true code-overflow: scroll slide-number: true width: 960 * 1.5 height: 700 * 1.5 lightbox: false # min-scale: 1 # max-scale: 1 pointer: pointerSize: 20 color: red menu: true embed-resources: false theme: [default, custom_hq_pretendard_step.scss] # 슬라이드 본문 폰트 크기 조정 revealjs-plugins: - pointer code-link: true execute: warning: false error: false freeze: auto dpi: 600 editor: visual webr: show-startup-message: false packages: [] filters: - webr # suppress-bibliography: true editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # Geospatial Visualization ## Maps: geometric data - `sf` package () ![](images/clipboard-3930476942.jpeg){fig-align="center"} ## Maps: geometric data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(sf) library(tmap) sigungu_shp <- st_read("sigungu.shp", options = "ENCODING=CP949") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} qtm(sigungu_shp) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](R_lec_10_2025_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Maps: static, a map as a graph - `ggplot2` package () - `geom_sf()` - `geom_sf_label()` - `geom_sf_text()` - `coord_sf()` - `stat_sf()` ## Maps: static, a map as a map - `tmap` package () ![](images/clipboard-3147080854.png){fig-align="center"} ## Maps: interactive, animated, 3D - `Plotly` () - R wrapper package: `plotly` package () - `Leaflet` () - R wrapper packag: `leaflet` () - `rayshader` package () ## Maps: `leaflet` example ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(leaflet) leaflet() |> addTiles() |> # addProviderTiles('CartoDB.Positron') |> addPopups(126.955184, 37.460422, "Sang-Il's Office") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Maps: `rayshader` example ![](images/clipboard-3713320529.png){fig-align="center"} ## Maps: `rayshader` example ![](https://wp.unil.ch/citadyne-news/files/2023/02/thworld.jpeg){fig-align="center"} ## Maps: `rayshader` example {.smaller} {{< video seoul_ani.mp4 height = "600" >}} # More Advanced R ## Advanced interactivity: Shiny ![](images/clipboard-3736716242.png){fig-align="center"} ## Advanced interactivity: Shiny - Web publication: ![](images/clipboard-2928271543.png){fig-align="center"} ## Advanced interactivity: Shiny - My first Shiny app - Spatial Kernel Density Estimation ## Advanced modeling ![](images/clipboard-3467293569.png){fig-align="center"} ## Advanced programming ![](images/clipboard-3235294248.png){fig-align="center"} ## R and Generative AI: ChatGPT - Automated code generation - Learning programming concepts - Creative writing and documentation - Debugging assistance - Improved Shiny app development - Assistance with statistics and data science ## R and Generative AI: ChatGPT - Air () - TheOpenAIR () - RTutor () - askgpt () - gptstudio () - gpttools () - gptchatteR () ## R and Generative AI: General - `GenAI` () ![](https://genai.gd.edu.kg/assets/img/overview.svg)
